attributes.action: Stop the Bulldozing of 500-600 trees to Build 72 houses on Longridge Wood, Middlesbrough
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Longridge Wood is a 3.1 hectare site in Middlesbrough.  We have been fighting for 3 years to stop the bulldozing of over 500 trees on this site.  It is a well used site by all local residents from young children who ride their bikes, climb the trees or just run about and have a good time to Senior Citizens some in their 90's who go to walk their dogs or just to keep healthy.
